short_summary: Procurement of projectors, mounts, and lenses
description: The Canadian Museum for Human Rights requires supply and delivery of the specified quantities and models of projectors, mounts, and lenses list in the attached documents.",
full_summary:
## Projector Refresh
### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number:** CMHR 1022886
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-28T15:00:00

### Delivery Location
The goods will be delivered to:
Canadian Museum for Human Rights
85 Israel Asper Way
Winnipeg, Manitoba R3C 0L5
Canada

### Required Equipment

The following listed models of equipment are required (no substitutions will be accepted):

* Lead Projector: Christie DWU-630GS (140-081100-XX)
* Secondary Lead Projector:  Christie D20WU-HS (140-063100-XX)
* Projects Mount: Chief RPAU
* Secondary Projects Mount: Chief VCM
* Lens #1: Christie GS 1.52-2.89 (140-102104-XX)
* Lens #2: Christie GS 1.22-1.52 (140-131106-XX)
* Lens #3: Christie GS 0.95-1.22 (140-101103-XX)
* Lens #5: Christie HS 0.65-0.75 (140-144100-XX)

### PROCUREMENT PROCESS
This procurement is being conducted under the Competitive - Open bidding method.

### TRADE AGREEMENTS
No preference has been given to any specific trade agreement.

### PROCUREMENT CATEGORIES
The procurement falls under the Goods category (GD).

### CONTACT INFORMATION
For more information, please contact:
Procurement Specialist
Canadian Museum for Human Rights
Bids@humanrights.ca
Phone: 204-583-2751
The bidding documents and information can be found on http://www.merx.com.  Fees may apply; See https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information. The specific page to view the abstract is:

https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2686827804/abstract?language=EN
